title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\UpdateNodePoolRequest
name: UpdateNodePoolRequest
description:
UpdateNodePoolRequests update a node pool's image and/or version.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.UpdateNodePoolRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.project_id
params.description: Deprecated. The Google Developers Console project ID or project number. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.zone
params.description: Deprecated. The name of the Google Compute Engine zone in which the cluster resides. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.cluster_id
params.description: Deprecated. The name of the cluster to upgrade. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.node_pool_id
params.description: Deprecated. The name of the node pool to upgrade. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.node_version
params.description: Required. The Kubernetes version to change the nodes to (typically an upgrade). Users may specify either explicit versions offered by Kubernetes Engine or version aliases, which have the following behavior: - "latest": picks the highest valid Kubernetes version - "1.X": picks the highest valid patch+gke.N patch in the 1.X version - "1.X.Y": picks the highest valid gke.N patch in the 1.X.Y version - "1.X.Y-gke.N": picks an explicit Kubernetes version - "-": picks the Kubernetes master version

params.name: data.image_type
params.description: Required. The desired image type for the node pool.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The name (project, location, cluster, node pool) of the node pool to update. Specified in the format projects/*/locations/*/clusters/*/nodePools/*.

params.name: data.locations
params.description: The desired list of Google Compute Engine zones in which the node pool's nodes should be located. Changing the locations for a node pool will result in nodes being either created or removed from the node pool, depending on whether locations are being added or removed.

params.name: data.workload_metadata_config
params.description: The desired workload metadata config for the node pool.

params.name: data.upgrade_settings
params.description: Upgrade settings control disruption and speed of the upgrade.

params.name: data.linux_node_config
params.description: Parameters that can be configured on Linux nodes.

params.name: data.kubelet_config
params.description: Node kubelet configs.

params.name: data.gcfs_config
params.description: GCFS config.

params.name: data.gvnic
params.description: Enable or disable gvnic on the node pool.

methods.name: getNodeVersion
methods.description:
Required. The Kubernetes version to change the nodes to (typically an upgrade).

Users may specify either explicit versions offered by Kubernetes Engine or version aliases, which have the following behavior:

  • "latest": picks the highest valid Kubernetes version
  • "1.X": picks the highest valid patch+gke.N patch in the 1.X version
  • "1.X.Y": picks the highest valid gke.N patch in the 1.X.Y version
  • "1.X.Y-gke.N": picks an explicit Kubernetes version
  • "-": picks the Kubernetes master version

Generated from protobuf field string node_version = 5 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = REQUIRED];

methods.name: setNodeVersion
methods.description:
Required. The Kubernetes version to change the nodes to (typically an upgrade).

Users may specify either explicit versions offered by Kubernetes Engine or version aliases, which have the following behavior:

  • "latest": picks the highest valid Kubernetes version
  • "1.X": picks the highest valid patch+gke.N patch in the 1.X version
  • "1.X.Y": picks the highest valid gke.N patch in the 1.X.Y version
  • "1.X.Y-gke.N": picks an explicit Kubernetes version
  • "-": picks the Kubernetes master version

Generated from protobuf field string node_version = 5 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = REQUIRED];

params.description:

Users may specify either explicit versions offered by Kubernetes Engine or version aliases, which have the following behavior:

  • "1.X.Y": picks the highest valid gke.N patch in the 1.X.Y version

  • "-": picks the Kubernetes master version
